text: Håvard Nielsen (born 15 July 1993) is a Norwegian professional footballer who plays as a forward for 2. Bundesliga club Hannover 96. He played for the Norway national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Vålerenga 2009 Tippeligaen 1 0 0 0 – 1 0 2010 1 0 1 1 – 2 1 2011 28 3 1 0 4 0 33 3 2012 16 6 2 1 – 18 7 Total 46 9 4 2 4 0 52 11 Red Bull Salzburg 2012–13 Austrian Bundesliga 24 3 0 0 – 24 3 2013–14 7 0 0 0 4 0 11 0 2014–15 0 0 0 0 – 0 0 2015–16 8 0 0 0 1 0 9 0 Total 39 3 0 0 5 0 43 3 Eintracht Braunschweig (loan) 2013–14 Bundesliga 16 2 0 0 – 16 2 2014–15 2.
